Name: Gary
Description:
Stetmann's best friend! Can use E-Gorb, Stetellite Overcharge, Semi-Stable Mass Transportation, and Super Gary Transformation Sequence.

Can attack ground and air units.

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Unleashes a traveling electrical orb that deals 50 damage per second to all enemies along its path. If Gary is in a Stetzone, he unleashes three orbs instead.
Root.Name: E-Gorb

Root.Tooltip: This ability unlocks at Commander Level 9.
Root.Name: Remnant Recycler

Root.Tooltip: When one of Stetmann's Mecha Zerg is destroyed and drops its Mecha Remnants near this unit, they are collected to be reconstructed at the corresponding tech building.
Root.Name: Remnant Recycler

Root.Tooltip: This ability unlocks at Commander Level 3.
Root.Name: Stetellite Overcharge

Root.Tooltip:
Overchages a target Stetellite, allowing it to actively grant bonuses to nearby units depending on the current Stetzone configuration. Overcharge effect lasts for 30 seconds.
- F.A.S.T. Overload grants 20% increased attack speed for 45 seconds.
- H.U.G.S. Overload grants a shield that absorbs 60 damage for 45 seconds.
- J.U.I.C.E. Overload regenerates 60 Egonergy and energy over 45 seconds.
Root.Name: Stetellite Overcharge

Root.Tooltip:
Overchages a target Stetellite, allowing it to actively grant bonuses to nearby units depending on the current Stetzone configuration. Overcharge effect lasts for 30 seconds.
- F.A.S.T. Overload grants 20% increased attack speed for 45 seconds.
- H.U.G.S. Overload grants a shield that absorbs 60 damage for 45 seconds.
- J.U.I.C.E. Overload regenerates 60 Egonergy and energy over 45 seconds.
Root.Name: Stetellite Overcharge

Root.Tooltip:
Overchages a target Stetellite, allowing it to actively grant bonuses to nearby units depending on the current Stetzone configuration. Overcharge effect lasts for 30 seconds.
- F.A.S.T. Overload grants 20% increased attack speed for 45 seconds.
- H.U.G.S. Overload grants a shield that absorbs 60 damage for 45 seconds.
- J.U.I.C.E. Overload regenerates 60 Egonergy and energy over 45 seconds.
Root.Name: Stetellite Overcharge

Root.Tooltip: Teleports Gary and all nearby units you control to a target Stetellite's location.
Root.Name: Semi-Stable Mass Transportation

Root.Tooltip: Cancels the upgrade order, returning the unit to its original state.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: This ability is locked by your Commander Prestige.
Root.Name: Super Gary Transformation Sequence

Root.Tooltip: This ability unlocks at Commander Level 5.
Root.Name: Super Gary Transformation Sequence

Root.Tooltip: Morphs into Super Gary. Increases the maximum charges of E-Gorb, Stetellite Overcharge, and Semi-Stable Mass Transportation. Can also use Gary-zone.
Root.Name: Super Gary Transformation Sequence
